# GCButtonElementName

**Structure**

The names of the button elements.

## Declaration

```swift
struct GCButtonElementName
```

## Getting extended gamepad shoulder button names

- **leftShoulder**: The name of the left shoulder button.
- **rightShoulder**: The name of the right shoulder button.
- **leftBumper**: The name of the additional left shoulder button.
- **rightBumper**: The name of the additional right shoulder button.

## Getting extended gamepad trigger names

- **leftTrigger**: The name of the left trigger.
- **rightTrigger**: The name of the right trigger.

## Getting extended gamepad face button names

- **menu**: The name of the primary menu button element.
- **options**: The name of the main options button element.
- **home**: The name of the main menu button element.
- **a**: The name for the controller’s A button.
- **b**: The name for the controller’s B button.
- **x**: The name for the controller’s X button.
- **y**: The name for the controller’s Y button.

## Getting extended gamepad thumbstick names

- **leftThumbstickButton**: The name of the left thumbstick element.
- **rightThumbstickButton**: The name of the right thumbstick element.

## Getting extended gamepad back button names

- **backLeftButton(position:)**: Returns the name of the back left button at the specified location.
- **backRightButton(position:)**: Returns the name of the back right button at the specified location.

## Getting steering wheel controller names

- **pedalClutch**: The name of the controller’s clutch.
- **pedalBrake**: The name of the controller’s brake pedal.
- **pedalAccelerator**: The name of the controller’s accelerator pedal.
- **leftPaddle**: The name of the controller’s left paddle.
- **rightPaddle**: The name of the controller’s right paddle.

## Getting Xbox button names

- **share**: The name of the Xbox share button.

## Getting arcade stick button names

- **arcadeButton(row:column:)**: Returns the name of the arcade stick button at the specified location.

## Type Properties

- **grip**
- **stylusPrimaryButton**
- **stylusSecondaryButton**
- **stylusTip**
- **thumbstickButton**
- **trigger**

## Element names

- **GCPhysicalInputElementName**: The name of a physical input element.
- **GCPhysicalInputElementTypedName**: A type-safe name for accessing elements of a physical input element collection.
- **GCAxisElementName**: The names for the elements that provide values along an axis.
- **GCSwitchElementName**: The name for an element that represents a switch.
- **GCDirectionPadElementName**: The names for directional pad elements.
- **Extended gamepad input names**: Constants for names of extended gamepad elements.
- **DualShock controller input names**: Constants for names of DualShock 4 elements.
- **Xbox controller input names**: Constants for names of Xbox elements.
- **Micro gamepad input names**: Constants for names of micro gamepad elements.
- **Directional Gamepad Input Names**: Constants for names of directional pad elements.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- GCPhysicalInputElementTypedName
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
